attributes.action: Calling for a general election again!!!? Can’t ignore it twice Starmer.
attributes.additional_details: You’re slowly destroying Britain that’s why!
attributes.background:
2 million people signed this last time to get rid of Starmer. Guarantee more this time. 
This country needs change from a proper leader with realistic views/ plans for the future. 
Make Britain Great Again.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
